name: WASHINGTON STATE HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association representing hospitals and health systems
sampleDescriptions: Monitor development of Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018, Omnibus appropriations bills and continuing spending resolutions to fund the government.
Advocate for extensions of expiring Medicare provisions, extension of the Children's Health Insurance Program and against payment cuts in the 340B drug discount program.
Advocate for opioid legislation and against payment cuts in the 340B drug discount program.
